name: Space Jam 2: We Got Aliens In This One
name_original: Space Jam 2: We Got Aliens In This One
description:
Space Jam 2: We Got Aliens In This One

Built for ScoreSpace Jam #11

Drift through space while strategically placing bombs to destroy the alien ships before they take down your shields. Along the way pick up health packs to replenish your shields and blackhole bombs to take out lots of enemies at once.

Controls:

  • Tap on screen to set bomb destination. Then swipe/hold along the line from the ship to teleport the bomb between nodes to the destination
  • Select the active bomb by tapping/clicking on the bomb icon on the top right.

Landing bombs directly on alien ships for max damage.

Created By

Harrison Gottlieb, Kirby Cofino (kgc00) and Patrick Lange (langep)

Made from a prototype by  https://msciortino17.itch.io

Icons from https://game-icons.net/

BGM from kim lightyear on https://opengameart.org/

SFX & visuals from https://www.kenney.nl/assets

Check out their stuff!
